name: Blowback
effects: Physical fire damage (2x, ATK) to all enemies (ignore cover)

desc_long: Deals fire damage partially unaffected by DEF to all enemies.
對全體敵人發動火屬性無視部分防禦的攻擊。

Inflige daño absoluto parcial de fuego a todos los enemigos.
